# backgroundExitData

**Instance Property**

The metrics for the background app exits.

## Declaration

```swift
var backgroundExitData: MXBackgroundExitData { get }
```

## Reading the background exit data

- **MXBackgroundExitData**: An object representing counts for the different types of background app exits.
